trans-unit.source: Enterprise State Roaming overview | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Enterprise State Roaming overview | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Provides information about Enterprise State Roaming settings in Windows devices.
trans-unit.target: Provides information about Enterprise State Roaming settings in Windows devices.

trans-unit.source: Enterprise State Roaming provides users with a unified experience across their Windows devices and reduces the time needed for configuring a new device.
trans-unit.target: Enterprise State Roaming provides users with a unified experience across their Windows devices and reduces the time needed for configuring a new device.

trans-unit.source: Enterprise State Roaming overview
trans-unit.target: Enterprise State Roaming overview

trans-unit.source: With Windows 10, [Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)](active-directory-whatis.md) users gain the ability to securely synchronize their user settings and application settings data to the cloud.
trans-unit.target: With Windows 10, [Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)](active-directory-whatis.md) users gain the ability to securely synchronize their user settings and application settings data to the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Enterprise State Roaming provides users with a unified experience across their Windows devices and reduces the time needed for configuring a new device.
trans-unit.target: Enterprise State Roaming provides users with a unified experience across their Windows devices and reduces the time needed for configuring a new device.

trans-unit.source: Enterprise State Roaming operates similar to the standard [consumer settings sync](http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-8/sync-settings-pcs) that was first introduced in Windows 8.
trans-unit.target: Enterprise State Roaming operates similar to the standard [consumer settings sync](http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-8/sync-settings-pcs) that was first introduced in Windows 8.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, Enterprise State Roaming offers:
trans-unit.target: Additionally, Enterprise State Roaming offers:

trans-unit.source: **Separation of corporate and consumer data** – Organizations are in control of their data, and there is no mixing of corporate data in a consumer cloud account or consumer data in an enterprise cloud account.
trans-unit.target: **Separation of corporate and consumer data** – Organizations are in control of their data, and there is no mixing of corporate data in a consumer cloud account or consumer data in an enterprise cloud account.

trans-unit.source: **Enhanced security** – Data is automatically encrypted before leaving the user’s Windows 10 device by using Azure Rights Management (Azure RMS), and data stays encrypted at rest in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: **Enhanced security** – Data is automatically encrypted before leaving the user’s Windows 10 device by using Azure Rights Management (Azure RMS), and data stays encrypted at rest in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: All content stays encrypted at rest in the cloud, except for the namespaces, like settings names and Windows app names.
trans-unit.target: All content stays encrypted at rest in the cloud, except for the namespaces, like settings names and Windows app names.

trans-unit.source: **Management and monitoring services** – More control and visibility over who syncs settings in your organization and on which devices.
trans-unit.target: **Management and monitoring services** – More control and visibility over who syncs settings in your organization and on which devices.

trans-unit.source: **Geographic location of data in the cloud** – Data will be stored in an Azure region based on the country of the Azure AD domain.
trans-unit.target: **Geographic location of data in the cloud** – Data will be stored in an Azure region based on the country of the Azure AD domain.

trans-unit.source: Article
trans-unit.target: Article

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Enable Enterprise State Roaming in Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Enable Enterprise State Roaming in Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.source: Enterprise State Roaming is available to any organization with a Premium Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) subscription.
trans-unit.target: Enterprise State Roaming is available to any organization with a Premium Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) subscription.

trans-unit.source: For more details on how to get an Azure AD subscription, see the Azure AD product page.
trans-unit.target: For more details on how to get an Azure AD subscription, see the Azure AD product page.

trans-unit.source: Settings and data roaming FAQ
trans-unit.target: Settings and data roaming FAQ

trans-unit.source: This topic answers some questions IT administrators might have about settings and app data sync.
trans-unit.target: This topic answers some questions IT administrators might have about settings and app data sync.

trans-unit.source: Group policy and MDM settings for settings sync
trans-unit.target: Group policy and MDM settings for settings sync

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 provides Group Policy and mobile device management (MDM) policy settings to limit settings sync.
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 provides Group Policy and mobile device management (MDM) policy settings to limit settings sync.
